metadata.title: CVE-2020-18651 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in functionID3_Support::ID3v2Frame::getFrameValue in exempi 2.5.0 and earlier allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service via opening of crafted audiofile with ID3V2 frame.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.6.4-1
libexempi8 - 2.6.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-1').
